
## Generic Function for Plotting <code>idealstan</code> objects {.unnumbered}


### Description

This generic function will run all the plotting functions associated with fitted <code>idealstan</code> objects.



### Usage

<pre><code class='language-R'>id_plot(object, ...)
</code></pre>


### Arguments

<table>
<tr><td style = "white-space: nowrap; font-family: monospace; vertical-align: top"><code id="object">object</code></td>
<td>
An <code>idealstan</code> object
</td></tr>
<tr><td style = "white-space: nowrap; font-family: monospace; vertical-align: top"><code id="...">...</code></td>
<td>
Other options passed onto the underlying plot function
</td></tr>
</table>
